<title level="1" right="Hazard 18" pfs="">[Storm Discharge](/Hazards.aspx?ID=111)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Divine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=48" />
<trait label="Electricity" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=56" />
<trait label="Environmental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=62" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Kaiju" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=383" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monsters of Myth](/Sources.aspx?ID=107) pg. 41

**Complexity** Simple

</column>

Ebeshra aligns its crystalline form to produce a blast of lightning that charges the surrounding area with electrical energy.

---

**Stealth**
DC 10

**Disable**
DC 45 [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) (master) to balance the electrical charges in the area or DC 48 [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) (expert) to momentarily divert Ebeshra's attention

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

**Lightning Blast** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** A creature takes a hostile action against Ebeshra, produces a visible area effect, or flies within 120 feet of Ebeshra; **Effect** Ebeshra unleashes a 240-foot line of electricity toward the triggering creature. Creatures in the line take 16d8 electricity damage (DC 42 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). The electricity creates a static field in all squares that the line passed through and all adjacent squares. For 1 round, any creatures that enter a space in the static field take 4d8 electricity damage (DC 38 basic Reflex save).

---
**Reset**
Ebeshra waits 1d4 rounds before another blast.
name: Storm Discharge
reset: Ebeshra waits 1d4 rounds before another blast.
